trans-unit.source: Defines an ordered list of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> objects that is applied to unsigned content prior to digest calculation.
The TransformChain class contains a list of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> objects that determine how to order XML data before creating a digest.
Use the TransformChain class whenever you need to add one or more transform objects to an encrypted XML document or to a signed XML document.
Both the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> class and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> class contain a TransformChain object.

You can add a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> class by calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.AddTransform%2A> method.

You can add a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> class by calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.AddTransform%2A> method.

You can also create a TransformChain object manually and pass it to either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.TransformChain%2A> property or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.TransformChain%2A> property.
If you want to sign only a portion of an XML document, you can use a transform to identify the XML elements you intend to sign.

Note that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.Uri%2A> property and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.Uri%2A> property automatically create internal transforms that allow you to sign a portion of a document.

For more information about transforms, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> class.
Adds a transform to the list of transforms to be applied to the unsigned content prior to digest calculation.
The transforms are applied to the unsigned content in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain> object.
The transform to add to the list of transforms.
Gets the number of transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
The number of transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
Returns an enumerator of the transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
An enumerator of the transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
Gets the transform at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
The index into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object that specifies which transform to return.
The transform at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
The index parameter is greater than the number of transforms.
